short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track the prices of the biggest cryptocurrencies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep an eye on price developments for 9k+ cryptocurrencies and tokens!

CryptoTracker shows real time data from the CoinGecko API and lets you track up to 25 coins or tokens at the same time.

Update Version 1.1.0:
- New options page will let you select up to 25 coins/tokens individually
- sort the data and preserve your preference
- smaller bugs fixed
- several currencies / cryptocurrencies added as vs currency

This project will be soon enriched with some more improvements and features!

If you like CryptoTracker - feel free to support to make it even better
